version_description:
- Manual screen rotate button added. Tap the rotate icon on the title screen to rotate the screen.
- Bug where a portion of the effects do not work after the last boss battle now fixed.
- BGM during the ending sequence now synced with the video.

- Bug where certain options cause the Magic Stone stat growth bonus to be reset now fixed.
- Bug where the max level Magic Stone booster induces no stat growth bonus now fixed. (Equipment bonuses do not apply.)
- Virtual game pad now responds beyond

- We have corrected the amount of Magic Stones that transfer from Marcus to Eiko when she joins the party.
(The amount of Magic Stones in games where Eiko has already joined the party will also be corrected based on level. However, the amount of Magic

-The bug where certain devices cannot access the Cloud save function has been fixed.
-The bug where disembarking from certain modes of transportation causes Zidane to disappear and players to be unable to progress in the game has been fixed.
-Other

Below are the details of the revision.
・The problems that forced termination when used summoned beast at some battle scenes.
・Others, some detailed wrong text.
